scripts._bootstrap:
# 将公共依赖包提取并安装各自的依赖 
 lerna bootstrap --hoist --registry http://s1.web.porsche-preview.cn
scripts._publish:69:
# 将所有包发布到 69 库上 
 lerna publish --registry http://s1.web.porsche-preview.cn
scripts._publish:nogit:
# ignore Git 提交 并将所有包发布到 69 库 
 npm run publish --  --skip-git --registry http://s1.web.porsche-preview.cn
scripts.rp:
npm run remove 
 npm run publish:nogit
